lead_paragraph: The California Division of Occupational Safety and Health issued four citations this week to SeaWorld that carried nearly $26,000 in fines.

headline.print_headline: California Agency Fines SeaWorld Over Safety
headline.main: California Agency Fines Seaworld Over Safety

snippet: The California Division of Occupational Safety and Health issued four citations this week to SeaWorld that carried nearly $26,000 in fines.
abstract: California Division of Occupational Safety and Health issues four citations to SeaWorld regarding orcas that total nearly $26,000 in fines.
